Service Details: - Supports African grandmothers who are raising orphaned grandchildren in communities affected by the AIDS pandemic- Increases awareness, raises funds, and strives to help these women nurture and raise a healthy, self-sufficient next generation- Monies raised help the Stephen Lewis Foundation fund grassroots initiatives in African communities identified as having the greatest need- Local volunteer opportunities available
Meetings: - Meetings are on the 4th Sat each month starting at 10:00am at First United Church (721 Bernard Ave, Kelowna) from Sep-Jun- Potential volunteers are welcome at our monthly meetings
